trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around April 17th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst object all of which were triangular in shape caught my attention becauseit did not have lights, was moving at a high rate of speed, and was able to slowinstantaneously and then suddenly resume its speed. I did not hear any soundscoming from it. It happened so quickly that I was left wondering what it couldhave possibly been. Within a few seconds or so, 3 additional craft in atriangular formation passed over head at a high rate of speed but not nearly asfast as the first object. What happened next was really breathtaking. Anotheraircraft presumably the first one I witnessed approached the formation at a veryhigh rate of speed. It stopped its rate of speed on a dime to join the formationof the others.
